DaparToolshed 0.99.0

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach.

Source: R/aggregation.R
aggIter.Rd

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach

aggIter(
  qPepData,
  X,
  conditions = NULL,
  init.method = "Sum",
  method = "Mean",
  n = NULL
)

Arguments

qPepData

A matrix of intensities of peptides.
X

An adjacency matrix
conditions

xxx
init.method

The method used to initialize the iterative algotirhm. Default is 'Sum'.
method

The method used for xxx. Default value is 'Mean'.
n

xxxx

Value

A matrix of protein intensities.

Author

Samuel Wieczorek

Examples

library(QFeatures)

utils::data(Exp1_R25_pept, package='DAPARdata2')
obj <- Exp1_R25_pept[seq_len(1000),]
obj <- addListAdjacencyMatrices(obj, 2)

#> Error in addListAdjacencyMatrices(obj, 2): impossible de trouver la fonction "addListAdjacencyMatrices"
X <- as.matrix(GetAdjMat(obj[[2]])$all)
conditions <- colData(obj)$Condition
aggIter(assay(obj,2), X, conditions)

#> Error in t(X) %*% qPepData: arguments inadéquats
